item.title: Thom Tillis wants you to know something: ‘I’m sick of stupid’
item.description: The North Carolina Republican has been at the forefront this month of staking out anti-MAGA ground and criticizing Trump’s aides.

item.title: These prosecutors spent years on cases. Then Trump pardoned the perps.

item.title: Vance steps in to host White House talks on Greenland’s future
item.description: Visiting officials appeared unnerved by the vice president’s planned involvement after they had sought a meeting with Secretary of State Marco Rubio.

item.title: Parents are cutting back on child care as costs stretch budgets
item.description: Research shows 1 in 5 families face child care hardships because of the expense, with single mothers most affected.
